event_registry_properties.name: action
event_registry_properties.item: Schedule a repair procedure to replace the affected resource, the identity of which can be determined using 'fmadm faulty'.

event_registry_properties.item: This strand has encountered an uncorrectable error.

event_registry_properties.item: There is no more information available at this time.

response
event_registry_properties.item: The fault manager will attempt to remove the affected strand from service.
